name: Survival Game - 3D Challenge
description:
Don't get eliminated and try to be the last survivor.
Welcome to Survival Game - 3D Challenge. Just try to give your best at death challenge.

Life is more interesting with the Survival Game - 3D Challenge! See what happens when you and your friend compete with each other to win the greatest prize and one person has to die. This can't be imagined! Survival Game - 3D Challenge will bring you the most wonderful experince.

Survival Game - 3D Challenge brings together the best of entertainment and augmented reality to create a safe, happy and immersive world where your creativity and imagination can run wild with some of best friends.

So what you are waiting for? Download Survival Game - 3D Challenge.
